author: Staff Reporter
text:
Christians took out a procession in various parts of Tuticorin on Palm Sunday. They carried palm leaves and sang hymns in praise of the Almighty. Special prayers were offered at churches. Rev Fr. Yvon Ambroise, Bishop of Tuticorin Roman Catholic Diocese, led the prayer at Sacred Heart Church on WGC Road and Fr. Lerin Derose, Rector and Parish Priest, at Our Lady of Snows Shrine Basilica on Beach road.

In Tirunelveli also, Bishop of RC Diocese, Palayamkottai, A. Jude Paulraj led the procession, which commenced at Centenary Hall and passed through Lourdunathan statue, South Bazaar and ended at St. Xavier’s Cathedral, Palayamkottai.
title: Palm Sunday procession taken out
